hero.title: About Our Practice
hero.description: Your partner for holistic dental health in Heidelberg for over 25 years. Modern dentistry with personal care.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.p1: In our dental practice, we combine state-of-the-art technology with personal, empathetic care. We work evidence-based according to the latest dental guidelines and continuously pursue further education.
philosophy.p2: Our goal is to preserve your natural teeth for as long as possible. Through preventive measures, minimally invasive treatment methods and regular training, we offer you dentistry at the highest level.
philosophy.p3: We take time for you - for comprehensive consultation, gentle treatment and your individual needs.

modern.title: State-of-the-Art Technology
modern.description: CEREC ceramics, digital X-ray, intraoral camera and dental laser for gentle treatments.

prevention.title: Prophylaxis & Prevention
prevention.description: Regular professional teeth cleaning and preventive care for lifelong healthy teeth.

care.title: Personal Care
care.description: Individual treatment plans and empathetic support for your wellbeing.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced dental professionals passionate about your dental health.

drHerrmann.name: Dr. med. dent. Christine Herrmann-Flechtenmacher
drHerrmann.bio: Specialist dentist for general dentistry with over 25 years of experience. Focus on aesthetic and functional dentistry. Continuous training in the latest treatment methods for optimal patient care.

gabriele.name: Gabriele Herrmann
gabriele.bio: Over 20 years of experience in prophylaxis and patient care. Competent contact person for all questions about your dental health and professional teeth cleaning.
